name: I Reincarnated as a Mascot Character and Tempted My Childhood Friend to Become a Magical Girl
name_original: I Reincarnated as a Mascot Character and Tempted My Childhood Friend to Become a Magical Girl
description:
By some twist of fate, you've turned into an adorable mascot character! However, a slight problem arises--you've also been dumped into the street to fend for yourself. Fortunately, a chance encounter with your childhood friend grants you an opportunity to fulfill your mission, and the two of you embark on an adventure together.

What's going on in the city?

Does the childhood friend score a “W”?

Will "I Reincarnated as a Mascot Character and Tempted My Childhood Friend to Become a Magical Girl" pass the 3-episode rule?

A NaNoRenO 2022 Visual Novel by:

Danette

Rund

Frostbitten Snowball

Ruewn
